definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">Entity picks up item</field><next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">This is the ignition item</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">It's only purpose is to light the portal for your entry</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
